document.full_text: the syrian army deployed on monday at the entrances to the southern city of deraa as officials tried to calm passions following protests for freedom in which five civilians were killed, residents said.
document.title: syria troops sent to deraa, mourners demand freedom
lines_and_colors: the syrian army deployed on monday at the entrances to the southern city of deraa as officials tried to calm passions following protests for freedom in which five civilians were killed, residents said.
